緎字的基本解释

緎
yù
羊羔皮的缝接处。
量词，丝二十缕为緎：“素丝五緎。”

緎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》雨逼切，入職，云。］
［《廣韻》況逼切，入職，曉。］
衣缝。

緎字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　緎； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页929第13
【廣韻】雨逼切【集韻】【正韻】越逼切【韻會】影逼切，?音域。【玉篇】縫也。或作??。【詩·召南】素絲五緎。【傳】緎，縫也。【爾雅·釋訓】緎，羔裘之縫。【註】孫炎云：緎之爲界域，然則縫合羔羊皮爲裘，縫卽裘之界域，因名裘縫爲緎。　又【廣韻】况逼切【集韻】忽域切，?音洫。義同。又【集韻】乙六切，音彧。○按《說文》作?，在黑部。

緎字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
緎字的起名意思

暂无。

緎
Basic explanation of words
緎
yù
The seam of lambskin.
As a measure word, twenty strands of silk are 緎: "Five 緎s of plain silk."
緎
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Guangyun" rain forcefully, entry, cloud. ]
[The situation of "Guang Yun" is pressing, enter the post, Xiao. ]
Sewing.
緎
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　緎; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 929 to 13
[Guang Yun] Rain force cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] more force cut [Yun Hui] Shadow force cut,? Vocal range. [Jade articles] Sewing also. Or as ??. 【Poetry·Zhaonan】Five pieces of silk. 【Biography】緎, sew. 【Erya·Shixun】緎, the seam of Laoqiu. [Note] Sun Yanyun: Jizhi is the boundary, but the stitching of lamb skin is fur, and the boundary of sewing the fur is called 緎.　 [Guang Yun] The situation is forced to cut [Ji Yun] Suddenly cut,? Yin Xun. The same meaning. Also 【Jiyun】B6 cut, sound Yu. ○According to "Shuowen", it is in Kurobe.

Name meaning
Nothing.
yù
сущ. шов, рубец (напр. на меховой шубе)
素丝五緎 пять швов белым шёлком на шубе
